title: Installing in Railway: Volume is banned in Dockerfiles
body:
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

Since Heroku doesn't offer free plan now, I'm looking for an alternative way to deploy doccano for free. I found Railway as one of the alternatives. However I can't seem to install it using docker.

How to reproduce the problem
---------
<!-- Include the details of how the problem occurred. Which option did you choose to install doccano? Did you come across an error? What else did you try? -->
1. Create a Railway project
2. Connect Github Repo
3. In Settings change root directory to `doccano` and set start command to `railway run`
4. Click `Deployments` tab to proceed.
```bash
# Error: Volume (VOLUME) is banned in Dockerfiles
```

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): Railway
